definitions.definition: To set apart for a deity or for religious purposes; consecrate.
To set apart for a special use
definitions.example: dedicated their money to scientific research.

definitions.definition: To commit (oneself) to a particular course of thought or action
definitions.example: dedicated ourselves to starting our own business.

definitions.definition: To address or inscribe (a literary work, for example) to another as a mark of respect or affection.
To open (a building, for example) to public use.
To show to the public for the first time
Used or intended for a particular purpose
